abstract: News Analysis; political battle over replacement of United States Supreme Court Justice Anton Scalia, particularly in regard to whether nomination will take place before or after November presidential election, is certain to be prolonged, complex and politically divisive.
snippet: The fight over his seat is likely to be long, and to pose tough questions about the Constitution....
lead_paragraph: The fight over his seat is likely to be long, and to pose tough questions about the Constitution.

headline.main: Scalia’s Supreme Court Seat and the Next Frontier in Political Hardball
headline.print_headline: Opening Next Frontier in Political Hardball
